{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRT54GC |revision=v3 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/01/2008 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SerComm |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=Q87-WRT54GCV3 |ic_id=3839-WRT54GCV3 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354;BCM5354KFBG, HA0831, P13, 879747, N2; |cpu1_cspeed=240 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L1605DM2I-12G |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 12-pad header,, J1,, |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354;BCM5354KFBG, HA0831, P13, 879747, N2; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amp IC;SiGe;SE2528L;SiGe, 2528L, 5257Y;1; |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Compact Wireless-G BroadBand Router}}
"YM600A-1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=993549 FCC photos]. {{see also|SerComm}} Device is using a single chip [[Broadcom]] WiSoC + Switch :{{TechInfoDepot|Linksys_WRT54GC_3.0}} *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/linksys/wrt54gc ''Linksys WRT54GC'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?p=660431 ''Linksys WRT54GC v3'' on '''DD-WRT''' forums] :[http://i.imgur.com/cOamx.jpg PCB image]
